title: Vasu Featured as One of the 2020 â€˜Fastcase 50' Honorees

description: Congratulations to Vasu Kappettu on winning the '2020 Fastcase 50' award. Each year the Fastcase 50 award honors innovators, visionaries, and legal leaders. Vasu has been recognized for her innovation efforts, integral contributions, and significant initiatives to Justia and many other legal technology companies. We are so proud to have you on our team Vasu!
